= Project Description =
  * 10 second elevator pitch (how do you sell this to an early adopter?): Mobile Campus Assistant is a project to develop a prototype open source mobile smart phone application and a mobile-specific website to provide students on the move with location and time sensitive information. For example, 'where is my nearest...' service such as wireless hotspots, public PC availability, directions to campus buildings, access to timetables.
